Quotes: The secret to humor is surprise.
Author: Aristotel

Quotes: Thus so wretched is man that he would weary even without any cause for weariness... and so frivolous is he that, though full of a thousand reasons for weariness, the least thing, such as playing billiards or hitting a ball, is sufficient enough to amuse him.
Author: Blaise Pascal

Quotes: I've had a perfectly wonderful evening. But this wasn't it.
Author: Groucho Marx

Quotes: Smiles form the channels of a future tear.
Author: Lord Byron

Quotes: Fools are my theme, let satire be my song.
Author: Lord Byron

Quotes: Often it does seem a pity that Noah and his party did not miss the boat.
Author: Mark Twain

Quotes: An intelligent hell would be;better than a stupid paradise.
Author: Victor Hugo

Quotes: Laughter is America's most important export.
Author: Walt Disney
